original: 'dis ni yul tha dad du yod pa nyid ma nges pa nyid du bstan to ;
analyzed: 'dis ni yul tha dad du yod pa nyid ma nges pa nyid du bstan to ;
translated: This teaches that it is not ascertained that sound exists as different in terms of place.

original: /'on te chu la sogs pa rten tha dad pa nyi ma du ma nyid du rmongs pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: /'on te chu la sogs pa rten tha dad pa nyi ma du ma nyid du rmongs pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t there a cause for the confusion that the sun is many, because of the difference in the supports, such as water?

original: 'di la ni 'khrul ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni 'khrul ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here there is not the slightest cause for confusion.

original: gang gi phyir 'khrul ba'i rgyu med pa na zhes bya ba 'dir ni khyad par dang bcas pa gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khrul ba'i rgyu med pa na zhes bya ba 'dir ni khyad par dang bcas pa gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod de /
translated: Because there is no cause for confusion, this is the reason that is explicitly asserted here, along with the qualification.

original: de ji ltar gtan tshigs 'khrul pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar gtan tshigs 'khrul pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How is this reason contradictory?

original: gsal byed sgra tsam zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gsal byed sgra tsam zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The term “mere sound of the articulators” is stated.

original: 'di la yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam tha dad pa'i 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di la yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam tha dad pa'i 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
translated: Here, too, it is similar because there is a cause for the confusion that is different, the mere sound of the articulators.

original: gsal byed sgra tsam rag las phyir //
analyzed: gsal byed sgra tsam rag las phyir //
translated: Because it depends on the mere sound of the articulators.

original: zhes bya ba ni sgra 'dzin pa zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgra 'dzin pa zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The term “grasping sound” is left out.

original: de'i yul du zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam gyi yul lo //
analyzed: de'i yul du zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam gyi yul lo //
translated: “Its object” is the object of mere sound.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
translated: “That” is sound.

original: dper na gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam rnam par chad pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i 'khrul ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba de bzhin du bsgre ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam rnam par chad pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i 'khrul ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba de bzhin du bsgre ba'i phyir /
translated: For example, just the sound that illuminates becomes the cause of error in the sound that is cut off, etc.

original: bar med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bar med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To extend this example, he says, “If there is no interval, etc.”

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
translated: “This” refers to the sound.

original: der zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i phyogs su'o //
translated: “There” refers to the region of space.

original: @148a * // thos pa ni sgra zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //🔽bar du ma khyab pa'i phyir ni sgra tsam dag gis zhes bya ba la ltos par bya'o //🔽de dag ces bya ba ni sgra tsam dag go //
analyzed: @148a * // thos pa ni sgra zhes bya ba lhag ma'o // bar du ma khyab pa'i phyir ni sgra tsam dag gis zhes bya ba la ltos par bya'o // de dag ces bya ba ni sgra tsam dag go //
translated: “Hearing” refers to the sound.🔽The rest is self-evident.🔽“Those” refers to the mere sounds.

original: de dag dang gang las byung zhes bya ba ni sgra rnams so //
analyzed: de dag dang gang las byung zhes bya ba ni sgra rnams so //
translated: “From those” refers to the sounds.

original: 'on te nyi ma gcig yin na yang yul rnam par chad nas 'dzin pa ma grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te nyi ma gcig yin na yang yul rnam par chad nas 'dzin pa ma grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But if there is only one sun, is it not the case that the object is not established as being apprehended as cut off?

original: 'di ltar mig gis snod tha dad du so so so sor tha dad par nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su gcod kyi nyi ma ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mig gis snod tha dad du so so so sor tha dad par nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su gcod kyi nyi ma ni ma yin no //
translated: In this way, the eye discriminates the image of the sun, etc., in different vessels, individually, separately, but not the sun.

original: khyed cag la ni gzugs brnyan don gzhan du mi 'dod pas gzugs brnyan du mi 'dzin pa na rgyu mtshan cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo zhes de ltar sems pa na gzhan gyi lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: khyed cag la ni gzugs brnyan don gzhan du mi 'dod pas gzugs brnyan du mi 'dzin pa na rgyu mtshan cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo zhes de ltar sems pa na gzhan gyi lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: When you think in this way, you are not seeing the slightest reason.

original: smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to this is stated in the lines beginning “It is said . . .”

original: smras pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: smras pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis so //
translated: “It is said” refers to the response of the other party.

original: cig car zhes bya ba ni cig car gyis so //
analyzed: cig car zhes bya ba ni cig car gyis so //
translated: “At once” means simultaneously.

original: 'dir lan bshad pa 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba smos te /🔽chu'i yul du gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od g-yo ba'i chos can gyis mig gi 'od snang so so la bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir lan bshad pa 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba smos te / chu'i yul du gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od g-yo ba'i chos can gyis mig gi 'od snang so so la bzlog pa ste /
translated: The response to this is stated in the lines beginning “Here it is said . . .”🔽The light of the sun, which is located in the object of water, has the property of movement. It reverses the light of the eye, which is located in the subject of water.

original: phyir bzlog pa ni nyi ma ste /
analyzed: phyir bzlog pa ni nyi ma ste /
translated: The light of the sun, which is located in the object of water, reverses the light of the eye, which is located in the subject of water.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi yul na gnas pa nyid du 'dzin to //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi yul na gnas pa nyid du 'dzin to //
translated: The sun, which is located in its own object, is apprehended.

original: snod ji bzhin du ni snod ji snyed par ro //
analyzed: snod ji bzhin du ni snod ji snyed par ro //
translated: “In accordance with the vessel” means in accordance with the size of the vessel.

original: de bas na lus tha dad du snang ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'di du ma nyid ga las yin te ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na lus tha dad du snang ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'di du ma nyid ga las yin te ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since the body appears as different, how can it be multiple at that time? It cannot be!

original: mig gi 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The thought is that it is due to the difference in the engagement of the eyes.

original: mig gi 'jug pa'i dbang gis mig tha dad kyang tha dad pa lta bur 'dzin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mig gi 'jug pa'i dbang gis mig tha dad kyang tha dad pa lta bur 'dzin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, although the eyes are different due to the power of the engagement of the eyes, they are apprehended as different, it is said:

original: ji ltar sor mos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar sor mos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “Just as with the fingers, etc.”

original: cung zad ni bag tsam ste sor mos mig mnan pa na ste /
analyzed: cung zad ni bag tsam ste sor mos mig mnan pa na ste /
translated: “A little” means a small amount. When the eyes are pressed by the fingers,

original: btsir ba na ji ltar dngos po gcig yin yang so sor sna tshogs pa nyid du mthong ngo //
analyzed: btsir ba na ji ltar dngos po gcig yin yang so sor sna tshogs pa nyid du mthong ngo //
translated: just as with a single thing, various things are seen separately.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mig gi 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference in the engagement of the eyes.

original: de kho na bzhin du kho bo cag gis sgra gcig yin na yang tha dad du 'dzin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du kho bo cag gis sgra gcig yin na yang tha dad du 'dzin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: In the same way, although sound is one, we apprehend it as different. Therefore there is no fault.

original: gzhan dag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Others” refers to

original: dper na nyi mchu sogs su //
analyzed: dper na nyi mchu sogs su //
translated: the Sautrāntikas, for example.

original: gcig kyang cig car sna tshogs dag / ces 'khrul ba'i yul nyid du bstan pa'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub pa yin no snyam du sems pa na /
analyzed: gcig kyang cig car sna tshogs dag / ces 'khrul ba'i yul nyid du bstan pa'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub pa yin no snyam du sems pa na /
translated: If you think that the reason “because they are not perceived as different” is not established,

original: gzugs brnyan don gzhan 'dod pa dag rtsod par byed do //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan don gzhan 'dod pa dag rtsod par byed do //
translated: then those who assert that a reflection is a different object argue as follows.

original: gal te nyi ma de nyid mthong gi gzugs brnyan ni ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te nyi ma de nyid mthong gi gzugs brnyan ni ma yin na /
translated: If you see the sun itself and not its reflection,

original: ci'i phyir 'di steng du mthong @148b bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di steng du mthong @148b bar mi 'gyur /
translated: why don’t you see it above?

original: gal te yul ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yul ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: If you apprehend the object just as it is,

original: de lta na de mthong bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na de mthong bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: then you see it as it is and not otherwise.

original: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, there would be an absurd consequence.

original: gzhan yang gal te khron pa la sogs pa der gzugs brnyan skyes par ma gyur na nyi ma la sogs pa gting dma' bar zhugs pa ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te khron pa la sogs pa der gzugs brnyan skyes par ma gyur na nyi ma la sogs pa gting dma' bar zhugs pa ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, if a reflection did not arise in a well, etc., how could you apprehend the sun, etc., as if it were submerged in the depths?

original: der nyi ma la sogs pa de ltar gnas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der nyi ma la sogs pa de ltar gnas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The sun, etc., does not exist in that way.

original: gzhan yang shar du kha bltas pa me long la lta ba na ji ltar nub tu kha bltas par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang shar du kha bltas pa me long la lta ba na ji ltar nub tu kha bltas par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, when one faces east and looks in a mirror, how could one’s face be in the west?

original: de'i tshe rgyab tu bltas pa'i gdong ba nye bar skye ba mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyab tu bltas pa'i gdong ba nye bar skye ba mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: At that time, one does not see one’s face that is in front of oneself.🔽The opponent replies:

original: chu dang nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed do //🔽'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: chu dang nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed do // 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Consider the following example.

original: gal te dbang po phyi rol du song ba na nyi ma rtogs par byed na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po phyi rol du song ba na nyi ma rtogs par byed na /
translated: If the sense faculty goes outside and apprehends the sun,

original: de'i phyir steng du gnas pa nyid du mthong ba 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir steng du gnas pa nyid du mthong ba 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: then it would be seen as being above,

original: 'og tu zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'og tu zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
translated: not below.

analyzed: gang gi phyir chos dang chos ma yin pas dbang du byas pa'i lus nyid kyi dbang po des 'dzin par byed par 'dod kyi /
translated: Because it is maintained that the sense faculty of the body, which is controlled by moral and immoral actions, apprehends it,

original: steng na gnas pa ni ma yin to /
analyzed: steng na gnas pa ni ma yin to /
translated: not that which is above.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gal te dbang pos de nyid dam //
analyzed: gal te dbang pos de nyid dam //
translated: If the sense faculty apprehends that

original: yang na phyi rol tu don te //
analyzed: yang na phyi rol tu don te //
translated: or an external object,

original: rtogs byed des 'di lus la 'di //
analyzed: rtogs byed des 'di lus la 'di //
translated: then this body would apprehend it.

original: rtogs byed de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rtogs byed de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: The eye is the same way.

original: 'di ltar rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rim pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The process is as follows:

original: gang dag chu snod du chu dang nyi ma mthong ba de dag gi chu dang nyi ma lta ba'i mig gcig nyid du steng dang 'og gi cha rnam pa gnyis kyis 'jug go //
analyzed: gang dag chu snod du chu dang nyi ma mthong ba de dag gi chu dang nyi ma lta ba'i mig gcig nyid du steng dang 'og gi cha rnam pa gnyis kyis 'jug go //
translated: The eye of a person who sees the sun and water in a water-vessel is the same eye that sees the sun and water, but it is engaged in two different ways, as the upper and lower parts.

analyzed: de la steng gi char gsal ba'i nyi ma bdag gis te skyes bu mi 'dzin to //
translated: The sun is seen in the upper part as clear, but the person is not seen.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rten yon por gnas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rten yon por gnas pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: de'i tshe mig gi dbang po rten drang por mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the eye faculty does not stand upright.

original: brgyud pas 'jug pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bskyed pa'i nyi ma log nas 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: brgyud pas 'jug pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bskyed pa'i nyi ma log nas 'jug pa ste /
translated: The sun is seen in the lower part as inverted, because the light rays of the sun are generated by the process of engagement.

original: rgyur 'gyur bas rtogs te /
analyzed: rgyur 'gyur bas rtogs te /
