original: 'di ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis 'od dag gi 'jug pa skyed la /
analyzed: 'di ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis 'od dag gi 'jug pa skyed la /
translated: Thus, the light rays of the sun generate the light of the sun.

original: 'jug pa ni mig gis so //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni mig gis so //
translated: The eye engages that light.

original: mig dag gis so zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi ma'i brgyud nas bskyed pa yin na'o //
analyzed: mig dag gis so zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi ma'i brgyud nas bskyed pa yin na'o //
translated: The eye engages the sun through the light rays of the sun.

original: 'od bdag ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: 'od bdag ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The light is the sun.

original: sting nas te gong na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'og nyid de 'og phyogs na gnas pa lta bur rlom mo //
analyzed: sting nas te gong na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'og nyid de 'og phyogs na gnas pa lta bur rlom mo //
translated: The sun is imagined to be below, as if it were located below, in the space below, the sun that is located above.

original: gang zhig ce na bdag go //
analyzed: gang zhig ce na bdag go //
translated: What is that? The self.

original: 'og gi nyi ma gzhan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'og gi nyi ma gzhan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The sun below is not different from the sun above.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why?

original: de gcig phyir te /
analyzed: de gcig phyir te /
translated: Because it is one.

original: nyi ma de ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma de ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sun is not different.

original: gzhan @149a * //
analyzed: gzhan @149a * //
translated: Others say:

original: dag ni mig ce'o //
analyzed: dag ni mig ce'o //
translated: The eyes are open.

original: de lta bas na de ma thag tu bshad pa'i mig 'jug pa'i dbang kho nas khron pa la sogs pa dang chu la sogs pa'i snod tha dad par nyi ma mtshams dang bcas par mthong ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na de ma thag tu bshad pa'i mig 'jug pa'i dbang kho nas khron pa la sogs pa dang chu la sogs pa'i snod tha dad par nyi ma mtshams dang bcas par mthong ste /
translated: Therefore, due to the power of the eye engaging in that way, the sun with its boundary is seen as separate vessels such as a well and so on and water and so on.

original: gzhan du na ji ltar tha mi dad pa tha dad du 'dzin par 'gyur /🔽shar bltas me long lta ba na //
analyzed: gzhan du na ji ltar tha mi dad pa tha dad du 'dzin par 'gyur / shar bltas me long lta ba na //
translated: Otherwise, how could it be apprehended as different when it is not different?🔽If you say,🔽“How could it be seen in the east

original: nub tu bltas pas ji ltar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
analyzed: nub tu bltas pas ji ltar 'gyur // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
translated: and how could it be seen in the west?”🔽and so on,

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then we say:

original: dang por mig gi 'od zer gyis byad khyed nas me long la sogs pa'i yul gyi bar du phyin pa'i 'jug pa de ni mdun na gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dang por mig gi 'od zer gyis byad khyed nas me long la sogs pa'i yul gyi bar du phyin pa'i 'jug pa de ni mdun na gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: First, the light rays of the eye travel from the face to the object, such as a mirror, and so on. This is called “going to the front.”

original: de dag kyang yul der gtugs te log pa na rang gi gdong ji ltar gnas par 'ong ba de yang phyir log pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang yul der gtugs te log pa na rang gi gdong ji ltar gnas par 'ong ba de yang phyir log pa yin no //
translated: When they reach the object and return, they come back to the face as it was. This is called “returning.”

original: de la mdun na gnas par 'jug pa'i gdong gis phyir log par 'jug pa ni bdag phyir log par 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de la mdun na gnas par 'jug pa'i gdong gis phyir log par 'jug pa ni bdag phyir log par 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The face that goes to the front and returns is the self that goes to the front and returns.

original: de'i phyir bdag gis phyir log par 'jug pa skyed pa'i gdong du 'gro ste /🔽'khrul pas phyir log pa'i gdong mthong ngo snyam du rlom pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag gis phyir log par 'jug pa skyed pa'i gdong du 'gro ste / 'khrul pas phyir log pa'i gdong mthong ngo snyam du rlom pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the self goes to the face that goes to the front and returns.🔽Through error, one sees the face that returns and thinks, “I see the face that returns.”

original: mig gi 'jug pa sna tshogs pa nyid 'khrul ba'i sa bon yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'jug pa sna tshogs pa nyid 'khrul ba'i sa bon yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The various goings of the eye are the seeds of error.

original: gzugs brnyan skye bar khas blangs nas lan gdab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan skye bar khas blangs nas lan gdab pa'i phyir /
translated: In response to the assertion that a reflection arises,

original: du ma'i yul du 'jug pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: du ma'i yul du 'jug pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “When the eye sense faculty goes to the front and returns,” and so on.

original: gzugs brnyan don gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na yang gzugs de dag sna tshogs pa nyid ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan don gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na yang gzugs de dag sna tshogs pa nyid ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if the reflection were to become a different object, those forms would not exist in a variety.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mtshungs pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mtshungs pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they are understood through sameness.

original: blo gcig gis yongs su gcad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo gcig gis yongs su gcad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are to be discerned by a single cognition.

original: de bzhin du sgra yang blo gcig gis rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du grub po //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra yang blo gcig gis rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du grub po //
translated: In the same way, sound is also established as a unity because it is to be understood by a single cognition.

original: de'i phyir yul tha dad pas rig par bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid du ga las 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul tha dad pas rig par bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid du ga las 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could the object of cognition be a variety because of the difference in objects?

original: 'on te gang gi phyir yul tha dad pas rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid du grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te gang gi phyir yul tha dad pas rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid du grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t it established as a difference because of being the object of cognition due to the difference in objects?

original: de'i phyir ji ltar blo gcig gis gnod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar blo gcig gis gnod ce na /
translated: Therefore, how can a single cognition be impaired?

original: yul gyi dbye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yul gyi dbye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “Because of the division of objects,” and so on.

original: gnod byed yin zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ni tshad ma thams cad kyi thu bo yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod byed yin zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ni tshad ma thams cad kyi thu bo yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The thought is that the one who is the object of harm is the direct perception, because it is the chief of all valid cognitions.

original: yul dang dus tha dad pas rig par @149b bya ba nyid 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul dang dus tha dad pas rig par @149b bya ba nyid 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that because of the difference of place and time, the awareness is mistaken, and therefore it is not a valid cognition,

original: dper na lha sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, for example, Devadatta, etc.

original: de bzhin sgra yang tha dad min //
analyzed: de bzhin sgra yang tha dad min //
translated: So also, sound is not different.

original: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
translated: The phrase in terms of place and time is supplied.

original: de ltar yul 'khrul ba'i sgo nas gnyi ga yang 'khrul ba yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar yul 'khrul ba'i sgo nas gnyi ga yang 'khrul ba yin par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having demonstrated that both are mistaken because of the error of place,

original: da ni dus tha dad pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i sgo nas yul dang dus tha dad pas dmigs pa dag gnyi ga yang 'khrul bar 'chad de /
analyzed: da ni dus tha dad pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i sgo nas yul dang dus tha dad pas dmigs pa dag gnyi ga yang 'khrul bar 'chad de /
translated: now he explains that both are mistaken because of the difference of place and time, in terms of the error of the difference of time.

original: ngo shes pa'i shes pa las gcig nyid du shes pa gang la yod pa de ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: ngo shes pa'i shes pa las gcig nyid du shes pa gang la yod pa de ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: That which has the awareness of one from the awareness of recognition is like that.

original: yul gyis min zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: yul gyis min zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: “Not by the object” is a mere illustration;

original: de bzhin du dus kyis kyang tha dad pa ma yin ta /
analyzed: de bzhin du dus kyis kyang tha dad pa ma yin ta /
translated: similarly, it is not different by time.

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no contradiction.

original: gcig 'khrul ba'i sgo nas gzhan yang 'khrul par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig 'khrul ba'i sgo nas gzhan yang 'khrul par ston pa yin no //
translated: It is shown that one is mistaken by way of the order, and the other is mistaken.

original: gal te rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe mi 'dra ba nyid du dogs par byed de /
analyzed: gal te rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe mi 'dra ba nyid du dogs par byed de /
translated: If one says, “It is not similar because of the order,” and so on, one doubts that the example is not similar.

original: 'di ltar lha sbyin yul dang dus tha dad pas dmigs na yang tha dad pa ma yin pa gang yin pa der ni mi 'gal ba'i rgyu rim par yod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha sbyin yul dang dus tha dad pas dmigs na yang tha dad pa ma yin pa gang yin pa der ni mi 'gal ba'i rgyu rim par yod pa yin la /
translated: Thus, although Devadatta is observed to be different by way of the object and time, there is no contradiction in that, because the cause exists in order.

original: sgra la ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir dpe dang don mi 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra la ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir dpe dang don mi 'dra ba yin no //
translated: But in the case of sound, there is no cause at all. Therefore, the meaning is not similar to the example.

original: 'di la yang mi 'gal ba'i rgyu smras pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang mi 'gal ba'i rgyu smras pa ni /
translated: Here, the cause of the noncontradiction is stated:

original: khyab ba'i phyir yang blta bar gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyab ba'i phyir yang blta bar gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Also, because of the pervasion, look!”

original: mi 'gal ba zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: mi 'gal ba zhes 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with “noncontradiction.”

original: sgra tsam rnam pa du ma khyab pa'i phyir zhes sngar bstan pa de yang gi sgras yang bstan to //
analyzed: sgra tsam rnam pa du ma khyab pa'i phyir zhes sngar bstan pa de yang gi sgras yang bstan to //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the sound itself is also established as being multiple and pervasive, as was previously explained.

original: ci'i phyir khyab pa nyid du khas len par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyab pa nyid du khas len par byed ce na /
translated: Why is it accepted that sound is pervasive?

original: chos gang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: chos gang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “Any property,”

original: yul dang phyogs tha dad pa dag la tha mi dad pa'i sgra 'dzin par grub par bya ba'i don du chos gang 'thad pa de nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas khas blangs par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: yul dang phyogs tha dad pa dag la tha mi dad pa'i sgra 'dzin par grub par bya ba'i don du chos gang 'thad pa de nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas khas blangs par bya ba yin la /
translated: in order to establish that the sound is apprehended as non-different in different places and directions. Since that property is not tenable elsewhere, it must be accepted.

original: 'dir yang sgra rtag pa dang khyab pa med par yul dang dus thams cad du 'dzin pa grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir sgra'i rtag pa dang khyab pa nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas grub po //
analyzed: 'dir yang sgra rtag pa dang khyab pa med par yul dang dus thams cad du 'dzin pa grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir sgra'i rtag pa dang khyab pa nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas grub po //
translated: And here, if sound were not permanent and pervasive, it would not be established as apprehended in all places and times. Therefore, since its permanence and pervasiveness are not tenable elsewhere, it is established.

original: rang bzhin tha dad par bya ba nyid kyang 'khrul pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad par bya ba nyid kyang 'khrul pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that the difference in nature is also mistaken,

original: dper na sa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na sa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “For example, earth,” and so on.

original: 'dir bsam pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir bsam pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not the intended meaning.

original: gal te sgrar rtogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i tha dad pa gtan tshigs nyid du khas len par byed /
analyzed: gal te sgrar rtogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i tha dad pa gtan tshigs nyid du khas len par byed /
translated: If you accept that the difference between the clarity and non-clarity of the realization of sound is itself the reason,

original: de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma grub pa @150a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma grub pa @150a * //
translated: then the reason is not established.

original: yin te / gang zhig sgra rtag par 'dod pa de ji ltar de'i rang bzhin tha dad pa gzhan gyi khyad par du smra bar byed //
analyzed: yin te / gang zhig sgra rtag par 'dod pa de ji ltar de'i rang bzhin tha dad pa gzhan gyi khyad par du smra bar byed //
translated: How could one who asserts that sound is permanent speak of it as having a different nature?

original: ci ste gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can de'i yul can gyi blo gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na /
analyzed: ci ste gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can de'i yul can gyi blo gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na /
translated: But if you say that the cognition that has the aspect of clarity or non-clarity is itself the reason,

original: de ni rang bzhin tha dad pa med par mi srid pa'i phyir de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin tha dad pa med par mi srid pa'i phyir de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
translated: then the reason is not established because it is impossible for it to be without a different nature.

original: dpar nas chen po brkos nas nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: dpar nas chen po brkos nas nam mkha' ste /
translated: For example, if one digs a large hole in the ground,

original: nam mkha'i snang ba la rang nyid kyis chen po la sogs pa med na yang de la brten pa nyid kyis chen po nyid la sogs pa'i shes pa skye ba de bzhin du sgra yang shin tu ma byas pa yin na yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam
analyzed: nam mkha'i snang ba la rang nyid kyis chen po la sogs pa med na yang de la brten pa nyid kyis chen po nyid la sogs pa'i shes pa skye ba de bzhin du sgra yang shin tu ma byas pa yin na yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam
translated: Likewise, even though sound is not very clearly articulated, the cognition of the articulation of sound arises in dependence upon it.

original: tha dad pa'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang blo tha dad pa 'di 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang blo tha dad pa 'di 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Thus, even though the nature of the different aspects does not exist, this different cognition arises.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni des 'dir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni des 'dir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is explained: “Here, it is like that.”

original: yang 'di ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin gyi rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin gyi rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it understood that this is a difference from another, but not by itself?

original: sgra 'jug pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgra 'jug pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “When sound is engaged,” etc.

original: 'dis ni 'di bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught by that:

original: blo la yod pa nyid kyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag sgra la sgro btags nas 'khrul ba yin gyi sgra rang nyid kyis rag pa la sogs pa srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blo la yod pa nyid kyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag sgra la sgro btags nas 'khrul ba yin gyi sgra rang nyid kyis rag pa la sogs pa srid pa ma yin te /
translated: The clarity or unclarity of the object that exists in the mind is a superimposition on sound. It is a mistake. It is not possible that sound itself is clear or unclear.

original: de ni ngo shes pas gcig nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ngo shes pas gcig nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established as one by recognition.

original: yang ci ste gal te yul de ltar rang bzhin tha dad par ma gyur na blo yang ga las 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: yang ci ste gal te yul de ltar rang bzhin tha dad par ma gyur na blo yang ga las 'gyur snyam na /
translated: Again, if the object does not become different in nature, how could the cognition be different?

original: bum pa la sogs la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa la rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang gsal bar byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa la rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang gsal bar byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: He says, “Also, with respect to a pot, etc.,”🔽Just as, even though a pot, etc., do not have different natures, the cognition of it is different, such as clear or unclear, because the illumination is different,

original: blo gsal ba dang gzhan pa la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du sgra yang rang las rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa na yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam tha dad pa'i phyir ring po la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: blo gsal ba dang gzhan pa la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du sgra yang rang las rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa na yang gsal bar byed pa'i sgra tsam tha dad pa'i phyir ring po la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes
translated: in the same way, even though sound does not have a different nature from itself, long, etc., are different because the sound that illuminates it is different.

original: bya ba la skyon med do //
analyzed: bya ba la skyon med do //
translated: This is faultless.

original: gzhan yang sgra rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra mi rtag pa nyid dam bca' ba'i gnod pa bstan pa'i phyir don dang 'brel ba mthong ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang sgra rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra mi rtag pa nyid dam bca' ba'i gnod pa bstan pa'i phyir don dang 'brel ba mthong ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Moreover, since it is not tenable that the capacity to make known the meaning is different from the sound, in order to demonstrate the contradiction of the thesis that sound is impermanent, he says, “One sees that it is related to the meaning,” and so on.

original: 'di ni don gyis go ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi don gyis go ba yin te /🔽'di ltar sgra las byung ba'i shes pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra'i rjod par byed pa'i nus pa grub po //
analyzed: 'di ni don gyis go ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi don gyis go ba yin te / 'di ltar sgra las byung ba'i shes pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra'i rjod par byed pa'i nus pa grub po //
translated: This is an inference based on what is commonly acknowledged by others.🔽Since it is not tenable that the consciousness that arises from sound is different from the sound, the capacity to express meaning is established.

original: @150b nus pa de yang sgra rtag pa med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir don gyis go ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi don gyis go ba yin no //
analyzed: @150b nus pa de yang sgra rtag pa med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir don gyis go ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi don gyis go ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not tenable that that capacity exists without a permanent sound, this is an inference based on what is commonly acknowledged by others.

original: de nyid rgyas par ston par byed de /
analyzed: de nyid rgyas par ston par byed de /
translated: He elaborates on that point:

original: re zhig 'brel ba ma bzung bar sgra yod pa tsam gyis rjod byed du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig 'brel ba ma bzung bar sgra yod pa tsam gyis rjod byed du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: First, without apprehending the relation, the mere existence of the sound does not make it an expression.

original: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba ni gal te don dang 'brel ba ma mthong yang rjod byed du 'gyur na de'i tshe snga na med pa yang ste dang po thos pa rgya gar gyi gling na gnas pa'i ba lang gi sgra yang rang gi don gsal bar🔽byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba ni gal te don dang 'brel ba ma mthong yang rjod byed du 'gyur na de'i tshe snga na med pa yang ste dang po thos pa rgya gar gyi gling na gnas pa'i ba lang gi sgra yang rang gi don gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If, although one does not see a connection with the meaning, it is still an expression, then the sound of a cow in the land of India, which is not heard previously, that is, at the beginning, would also make its meaning clear.

original: 'on te 'di thams cad la rtsod pa med pa'i grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: 'on te 'di thams cad la rtsod pa med pa'i grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin nam //
translated: But isn’t it the case that this is not established without dispute?

original: 'brel pa mi shes pa'i sgra ni rjod par byed pa 'ga' yang 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa mi shes pa'i sgra ni rjod par byed pa 'ga' yang 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: No one asserts that a sound whose connection is not known is an expression.

original: rtag pa de ji ltar 'brel ba shes pa 'dis rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa de ji ltar 'brel ba shes pa 'dis rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could that permanent sound be understood through knowing its connection?

original: 'di'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “Its connection,” and so on.

original: sgra dang don mdun du gzhag nas de dag gi 'brel ba byed cing byas nas kyang de las dus phyis don shes par byed la /
analyzed: sgra dang don mdun du gzhag nas de dag gi 'brel ba byed cing byas nas kyang de las dus phyis don shes par byed la /
translated: Having placed the sound and the meaning in front of them, they make a connection between them. Having made the connection, they later understand the meaning from that.

original: sgra ni brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir 'di mi rigs so //
translated: Since the sound is destroyed immediately after it is uttered, this is not reasonable.

original: 'di nyid 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid 'chad pa ni /
translated: He explains this:

original: mi rtag pa ni 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni 'thad ma yin //
translated: Impermanence is not tenable.

original: zhes bya'o // ci ste dus de tsam nyid du gnas pa yin na aa'i 'o na dus gzhan du gnas pa yang mi zlogs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // ci ste dus de tsam nyid du gnas pa yin na aa'i 'o na dus gzhan du gnas pa yang mi zlogs pa nyid yin te /
translated: If it endures for just that long, then it is not refuted that it endures for another time,

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de snyed dus su bstan pa 'di //
analyzed: de snyed dus su bstan pa 'di //
translated: This teaching of time

original: su zhig phyi nas 'jig par byed //🔽ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: su zhig phyi nas 'jig par byed // ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: is destroyed by another.

original: yang ci ste 'brel ba'i dus kyi bar du gnas la phyis rang nyid kyis 'jig go snyam na /
analyzed: yang ci ste 'brel ba'i dus kyi bar du gnas la phyis rang nyid kyis 'jig go snyam na /
translated: If it endures for the duration of the connection and is later destroyed by itself,

original: gzhan la 'brel ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan la 'brel ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then it is said, “The connection with another . . . ”

original: gzhan la ni brda'i dus na yod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ni brda'i dus na yod pa'o //
translated: The connection with another is at the time of the convention.

original: lhag ma ni don go bar zad do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni don go bar zad do //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: ci ste zhes bya bas gzhan gyis bsam pa rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya bas gzhan gyis bsam pa rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: The word “if” indicates that the opponent’s thought is being explored.

original: gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i dus na brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra bzhin du rang bzhin gyi rjod par byed pa 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i dus na brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra bzhin du rang bzhin gyi rjod par byed pa 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is said that “some other” is the nature of the expression at the time of the convention, like the sound that exists at the time of the convention,🔽then the response is:

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: rgyu mtshan med par sgra 'di ni don 'di'i rjod par byed pa yin no zhes nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par sgra 'di ni don 'di'i rjod par byed pa yin no zhes nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no reason, there is no certainty that this sound is the expresser of this meaning.

original: 'on te nges pa med do zhes ji ltar brjod /
analyzed: 'on te nges pa med do zhes ji ltar brjod /
translated: But if there is no certainty, how can it be stated?

original: ji ltar ga las don rtogs par 'gyur ba de nyid rang bzhin gyis don rtogs par byed do zhes gsal po nyid du nges par byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar ga las don rtogs par 'gyur ba de nyid rang bzhin gyis don rtogs par byed do zhes gsal po nyid du nges par byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn’t it clearly ascertained that just that which causes the understanding of the meaning causes the understanding of the meaning by its nature?

original: ga las zhes bya ba @151a * //
analyzed: ga las zhes bya ba @151a * //
translated: The response to that is “From where?”

original: la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: 'di ni don gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di nyan pa po rnams la 'gyur ba bden te /
analyzed: 'di ni don gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di nyan pa po rnams la 'gyur ba bden te /
translated: It is true that listeners ascertain that this is what causes the understanding of the meaning,

original: de dag las don rtogs par skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag las don rtogs par skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the understanding of the meaning arises from them.

original: sbyor ba po rnams la ni 'di rnyed par dka' ste /🔽'di dag sgra de las don rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba po rnams la ni 'di rnyed par dka' ste / 'di dag sgra de las don rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is difficult for the speaker to ascertain that,🔽because those sounds do not cause the understanding of the meaning.

original: de dag ni gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba kho na'i phyir sgra sbyor ba yin na /
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba kho na'i phyir sgra sbyor ba yin na /
translated: Because they use sounds only to be understood by others,

original: de gang las smra ba po rnams kyi des pa 'thad pa yin /
analyzed: de gang las smra ba po rnams kyi des pa 'thad pa yin /
translated: How is it that the wise are correct in their assertions?

original: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
translated: He teaches just that:

original: 'di mi shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di mi shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Because of not knowing this…”

original: de'i phyir de ltar na mi shes pa'i phyogs la nyes pa 'di yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar na mi shes pa'i phyogs la nyes pa 'di yin no ;
translated: Therefore, in this way, this fault is in the position of not knowing.

original: / shes pa'i phyogs la yang 'di des sngar nges par shes pa'i phyir 'di bstan pa'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / shes pa'i phyogs la yang 'di des sngar nges par shes pa'i phyir 'di bstan pa'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: And in the position of knowing, because of the prior ascertainment by that, it is taught that “this comes by the power of teaching it.”

original: gal te shes na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gal te shes na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “If one knows…” and so forth.

original: 'on te ji ltar sgron me la sogs pa'i 'od zer sar pa yin yang don gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du sgra yang 'dra bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /🔽mngon sum lhag ma yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar sgron me la sogs pa'i 'od zer sar pa yin yang don gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du sgra yang 'dra bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na / mngon sum lhag ma yin pa'i phyir //
translated: But if it is like the light of a lamp and so forth, which is new but clarifies the object, then sound would also be like that.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “Because of the remainder of direct perception.”

original: sgron ma mngon sum gyis lhag ma nyid ni yan lag gi dngos po ste /
analyzed: sgron ma mngon sum gyis lhag ma nyid ni yan lag gi dngos po ste /
translated: The remainder of direct perception of the lamp is the entity of the part.

original: de ni yul legs par byas pas sam dbang po legs par byas pas mngon sum gyis shes pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba na gsar pa yin yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ni yul legs par byas pas sam dbang po legs par byas pas mngon sum gyis shes pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba na gsar pa yin yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur la /
translated: It is new, but it is a clarifier, because it becomes a limb of the cognition by the proper functioning of the object or the proper functioning of the sense faculty.

original: sgra ni dngos su dbang po las 'das pa'i don ston par byed pa'i phyir gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni dngos su dbang po las 'das pa'i don ston par byed pa'i phyir gtso bo yin te /
translated: Sound is primary, because it directly reveals the object that is beyond the senses.

original: de'i phyir mi 'dra'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi 'dra'o //
translated: Therefore, they are not similar.

original: yang na mngon sum gyi yan lag gang yin pa de 'brel pa shes pa la ltos pa med pa yang gsal bar byed de mig yin no //
analyzed: yang na mngon sum gyi yan lag gang yin pa de 'brel pa shes pa la ltos pa med pa yang gsal bar byed de mig yin no //
translated: Or, that which is a limb of perception, which is not dependent on the cognition of the connection, is a clarifier, like the eye.

original: sgron ma yang mngon sum gyi yan lag yin te /
analyzed: sgron ma yang mngon sum gyi yan lag yin te /
translated: The lamp is also a limb of perception.

original: de lta bas na sar pa yin yang gsal bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta bas na sar pa yin yang gsal bar byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is new, but it is a clarifier.

original: sgra ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi yan lag ma yin pas mi mtshungs so //
analyzed: sgra ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi yan lag ma yin pas mi mtshungs so //
translated: But sound is not similar, because it is not a limb of perception, since it has an object that is hidden.

original: 'on te yang sgra gsar pa yin yang snga ma dang 'dra ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas spyod par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yang sgra gsar pa yin yang snga ma dang 'dra ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas spyod par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But if sound is new, is it not the case that it is used by following the former, which is similar?

original: 'dra ba nyid ni ma rtogs phyir //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni ma rtogs phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Because similarity itself is not understood.

original: 'dra ba ma rtogs par de'i sgo nas rjod par byed pa nyid du rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba ma rtogs par de'i sgo nas rjod par byed pa nyid du rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, “similarity itself” is not understood, and it is not reasonable to express it in that way.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would lead to absurd consequences.

original: gzhan yang 'dra ba rtogs pa zhes bya ba re zhig @151b lta zhog /'dra ba nyid mi srid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gcig pa gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dra ba rtogs pa zhes bya ba re zhig @151b lta zhog /'dra ba nyid mi srid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gcig pa gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Moreover, let us set aside for the moment the claim that similarity is understood. He says, “What is the same?” in order to demonstrate that similarity itself is impossible.

original: gcig gis rjod par byed pa grub na /
analyzed: gcig gis rjod par byed pa grub na /
translated: If it is established that one is the means of expression,

original: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir cig shos de lta bu kho na'o zhes bya bar brtag par byas na de yang srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir cig shos de lta bu kho na'o zhes bya bar brtag par byas na de yang srid pa ma yin te /
translated: then because the other is similar to it, it is imagined to be just like that. But that is not possible.

original: sgra thams cad don dang 'brel ba nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra thams cad don dang 'brel ba nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not understood that all words are related to their referents.

original: yang ci ste sngar brda'i dus su mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid don dang ldan pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: yang ci ste sngar brda'i dus su mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid don dang ldan pa nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, if it is argued that what was seen at the time of the convention is itself related to the referent,

original: des na cig shos dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na cig shos dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the other would be similar to it.

original: de tshe tsam long khom ga las //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de tshe tsam long khom ga las // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: How can you find the time to be idle?🔽🔽

original: sngar mthong ba'i sgra de srid du gnas pa'i long khom ga las te /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i sgra de srid du gnas pa'i long khom ga las te /
translated: How can there be time to wait for the sound to last as long as the object is perceived?

original: de ni brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sound is destroyed immediately after it is uttered.

original: gal te brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa de lta na yang ci'i phyir don dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa de lta na yang ci'i phyir don dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is destroyed immediately after it is uttered, how can it be meaningful?

original: gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The word “two” and so on are seen to occur repeatedly.

original: yang nas yang du 'byung bar mthong ba ni sgra dang don gyis 'brel pa shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yang nas yang du 'byung bar mthong ba ni sgra dang don gyis 'brel pa shes pa yin gyi /
translated: The word and the object are recognized as being related,

original: lan cig dmigs pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lan cig dmigs pas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by a single perception.

original: ci ste ris mthun pa gzhan 'dzin pa na de nyid don dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod na /
analyzed: ci ste ris mthun pa gzhan 'dzin pa na de nyid don dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod na /
translated: If it is said that the sound is meaningful when it is apprehended in another continuum,🔽that is not reasonable.

original: de ni mi rigs te de'i phyir sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te de'i phyir sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that “those who do not understand another sound” and so on.

original: rtogs pa po gang dag sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa de dag thos pa'i dus na 'di don rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa po gang dag sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa de dag thos pa'i dus na 'di don rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Those who understand the word do not understand the other sounds, and when they hear the word, it does not cause them to understand the meaning,

original: de'i tshe tha dad pa'i rten can gyi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe tha dad pa'i rten can gyi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time there is no similarity based on the difference.

original: yang de nyid sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa'i rtogs pa po de dag gi don rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin te /
analyzed: yang de nyid sgra gzhan ma rtogs pa'i rtogs pa po de dag gi don rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin te /
translated: But if you say that it is the word itself that causes those who do not understand the other sounds to understand the meaning, that is absurd.

original: ci ltar gcig la byed pa dang mi byed pa phan tshun 'gal bdag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar gcig la byed pa dang mi byed pa phan tshun 'gal bdag tu 'gyur /
translated: How could it be that one thing, the word, both does and does not cause understanding, which are mutually exclusive?

original: gzhan thos pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan ris mthun pa'i sgra'i yul can gyi thos pa rtogs pa po gang dag la yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan thos pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan ris mthun pa'i sgra'i yul can gyi thos pa rtogs pa po gang dag la yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who hear the other sounds are those who understand the word, who have the object of the word in their continuum.

original: de ltar re zhig rjod par byed pa nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra rtag pa nyid du bsgrubs nas da ni 'brel pa byed pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa sgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rjod par byed pa nyid gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra rtag pa nyid du bsgrubs nas da ni 'brel pa byed pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa sgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since it is not tenable that the expression is different, having proven that the word is permanent, now in order to prove that it is not tenable that the relation is different, it is said,

original: re zhig sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: re zhig sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “First the sound . . .”

original: dang por brjod la de las 'brel pa byed cing de las tha snyad du byed do zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'dis tha snyad brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i rim can ma yin pa la ji ltar 'gyur /🔽zhig pa la 'brel par bya bar mi nus pa 'ba' zhig @152a * //
analyzed: dang por brjod la de las 'brel pa byed cing de las tha snyad du byed do zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'dis tha snyad brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i rim can ma yin pa la ji ltar 'gyur / zhig pa la 'brel par bya bar mi nus pa 'ba' zhig @152a * //
translated: The order is that first there is the expression, then the relation, and then the convention. How could this be in the case of a sound that is not sequential and that ceases immediately upon being expressed?

original: tu ma zad des rtogs pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tu ma zad des rtogs pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Not only is it impossible to relate to a destroyed object, but also there is no understanding of it.

original: tha snyad kyi dus su rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir dang / brda yang tha snyad kyi don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi dus su rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir dang / brda yang tha snyad kyi don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not occur at the time of the convention, and because the sign is for the sake of the convention.

original: de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug sdud par byed de /
analyzed: de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug sdud par byed de /
translated: “Therefore . . . ” and so on concludes.

original: gang la 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa 'di ni ma 'brel pa ste /🔽ma 'brel pa'i phyir dang zhes pa'i phyir re zhig snga ma ste /
analyzed: gang la 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa 'di ni ma 'brel pa ste / ma 'brel pa'i phyir dang zhes pa'i phyir re zhig snga ma ste /
translated: That which does not have a relation is unrelated.

original: brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra ni don med pa yin no //
analyzed: brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra ni don med pa yin no //
translated: Because it is unrelated, first, the sound that exists at the time of the sign is meaningless.

original: 'o na ni tha snyad kyi dus na yod pa don dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni tha snyad kyi dus na yod pa don dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it exists at the time of conventional usage, it must have a purpose.

original: phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is stated:

original: 'o na gal te rim can ma yin pa rim gyis brjod pa la sogs pa mi 'thad na 'o na cig car ba yin la rag mod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rim can ma yin pa rim gyis brjod pa la sogs pa mi 'thad na 'o na cig car ba yin la rag mod ce na /
translated: If it is not tenable that a non-series is expressed serially, then it must be expressed all at once.

original: sgra brjod pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgra brjod pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is stated:

original: sgra brjod pa dang 'brel ba byed pa dang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ces bya ba gsum po 'di dag ni bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra brjod pa dang 'brel ba byed pa dang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ces bya ba gsum po 'di dag ni bya ba yin no //
translated: The three—the expression of sound, the performance of activity, and the conventions of the world—are actions.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rim pa dang ldan pa de dag ni cig car bya bar nus pa ma yin cig car ma yin par yang 'brel ba byed par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rim pa dang ldan pa de dag ni cig car bya bar nus pa ma yin cig car ma yin par yang 'brel ba byed par mi 'thad do //
translated: Those that possess a sequence by way of their own nature cannot perform their actions all at once. It is also untenable that they perform their activity all at once.

original: rim pa la sdod na ni sgra nges par dus gzhan du gnas par khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pa la sdod na ni sgra nges par dus gzhan du gnas par khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they abide in sequence, then it would be accepted that sound definitely endures at another time.

original: yul dang dus sogs zhes bya bas mjug sdud par byed de /
analyzed: yul dang dus sogs zhes bya bas mjug sdud par byed de /
translated: The summary is stated:

original: sogs pa'i sgras byis pa dang gzhon nu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras byis pa dang gzhon nu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase “and so on” is meant to include the stages of childhood, youth, and so on.

original: sngon du zhes bya ba ni sgra gzhan ma thos phyir zhes bya ba dang sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngon du zhes bya ba ni sgra gzhan ma thos phyir zhes bya ba dang sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase “prior to” is to be connected with the phrase “because another sound is not heard.”

original: des na don 'gyur te sngar brda'i dus su don dang ldan pa'i sgra gzhan ma thos pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: des na don 'gyur te sngar brda'i dus su don dang ldan pa'i sgra gzhan ma thos pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: Because another sound that is associated with a meaning is not heard at the time when the convention is first established,

original: khyed kyi lugs kyis yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i tha snyad du byed pa po rnams 'brel pa ma byas pa'i sgra gcig kyang grub par 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyi lugs kyis yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i tha snyad du byed pa po rnams 'brel pa ma byas pa'i sgra gcig kyang grub par 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: in your system, the speaker and the listener would not be able to establish a single sound that is not related to a particular object, etc.

original: de lta bas na 'brel ba ma byas par khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'brel ba ma byas par khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you must accept that the sound is not related to the object.

original: de ni 'brel pa brjod pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'brel pa byed pa skyon gang yin pa de brjod pa la yang yin no zhes bsgre ba ni /
analyzed: de ni 'brel pa brjod pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas sgra rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'brel pa byed pa skyon gang yin pa de brjod pa la yang yin no zhes bsgre ba ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the sound is permanent because it is not tenable that the relation is expressed in another way, the root text states, “The same fault applies to the claim that the relation is created.”

original: 'di yi 'brel ba brjod na yang //
analyzed: 'di yi 'brel ba brjod na yang //
translated: The Commentary explains:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: ji ltar zhes rtogs na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes rtogs na /
translated: How is this understood?

original: zhig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said, “The past and the future,” and so on.

original: zhig pa ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: zhig pa ni 'das pa'o //
translated: The past is the destroyed.

original: med pa ni ma 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: med pa ni ma 'ongs pa ste /
translated: The future is the non-existent.

original: de dag na med pa'i phyir 'brel ba brjod pa srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag na med pa'i phyir 'brel ba brjod pa srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Since they do not exist, it is impossible to express their connection.

original: de ltar byung ba yang de ni brjod ma @152b thag tu 'jig pa nyid kyis gang las dus de snyed pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar byung ba yang de ni brjod ma @152b thag tu 'jig pa nyid kyis gang las dus de snyed pa yin /
translated: The present is also not tenable, because it is destroyed immediately after it arises.

original: de nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says:

original: smra ba po nyan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: smra ba po nyan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The speaker and the hearer,” and so on.

original: smra ba pos sngar thos pa'i sgra nyan pa po la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: smra ba pos sngar thos pa'i sgra nyan pa po la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: The speaker is not able to teach the sound that was previously heard to the hearer,

original: de ni sngar 'gags zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni sngar 'gags zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has already ceased.

original: gang yang ston par byed pa'i don dang ldan pa de yang bstan par bya bar mi nus /
analyzed: gang yang ston par byed pa'i don dang ldan pa de yang bstan par bya bar mi nus /
translated: Also, that which is the object of teaching is not able to be taught,

original: de la sngar 'brel pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //🔽'dra bar brjod ces bya ba de tsam zhig srid pa yin la /
analyzed: de la sngar 'brel pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro // 'dra bar brjod ces bya ba de tsam zhig srid pa yin la /
translated: because a connection was not previously made with it.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is possible that it is said to be similar, but that is not the case.

original: de yi tshe na 'dra ba'i sgra //
analyzed: de yi tshe na 'dra ba'i sgra //
translated: At that time, the word “like”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: is used.

original: 'di gang ci yang rung bas 'dra bar 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di gang ci yang rung bas 'dra bar 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not asserted to be like anything at all.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: don dang ldan pa yin la de yang mi 'thad do //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa yin la de yang mi 'thad do //
translated: It is meaningful, but that is not tenable.

original: gal te nyan pa pos don dang ldan pa'i sgra 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na de'i tshe de dang 'dra bar 'thad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te nyan pa pos don dang ldan pa'i sgra 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na de'i tshe de dang 'dra bar 'thad par 'gyur te /
translated: If the hearer perceives a sound that is meaningful, then it would be tenable to say that it is like that.

original: gang gi phyir sngar brda'i dus su don dang ldan par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngar brda'i dus su don dang ldan par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not reasonable, because at the time of the convention, the hearer does not apprehend the meaning.

original: 'on brjod bzhin pa gang yin pa de don dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on brjod bzhin pa gang yin pa de don dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the sound that is being uttered is meaningful?

original: rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response begins with the words “If it is meaningful by itself.”

original: 'di brjod bzhin pa na yang don dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di brjod bzhin pa na yang don dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: Even when it is being uttered, it is not meaningful,

original: de la sngar 'brel pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la sngar 'brel pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because it has not previously been related to a meaning.

original: smra ba po zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gi tshe smra ba po yang rim gyis nyan pa por 'gyur ba de'i tshe de la yang snga mar thos pa'i sgra ni don ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa'i tshogs de dag nyid 'thob pa🔽yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: smra ba po zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gi tshe smra ba po yang rim gyis nyan pa por 'gyur ba de'i tshe de la yang snga mar thos pa'i sgra ni don ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa'i tshogs de dag nyid 'thob pa yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: By the speaker, etc., he shows that when the speaker himself becomes the hearer in sequence, then he too incurs the same mass of faults, such as the sound heard earlier is meaningless, etc.

original: de'i phyir 'dis ni smra ba po thams cad kyi sgra don dang ldan pa 'ga' yar yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis ni smra ba po thams cad kyi sgra don dang ldan pa 'ga' yar yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, this shows that no sound of any speaker has a meaning.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba mjug sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba mjug sdud pa yin no //
translated: The phrase therefore is a conclusion.

original: brjod bya rjod byed ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
translated: By the expressed and the expresser, etc., he anticipates the opponent's former position.

original: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dag go //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dag go //
translated: The expressed and the expresser.

original: phan tshun go rims bzhin du brjod bya rjod byed kyi nus pa rang bzhin du gyur pa yod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun go rims bzhin du brjod bya rjod byed kyi nus pa rang bzhin du gyur pa yod pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The capacity of the expressed and the expresser is not inherently existent, as they are mutually dependent.

original: 'o na ji ltar sgra las rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgra las rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well then, how does understanding arise from words?

original: gal te mig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te mig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “If it were the case that understanding arose from words, etc.

original: gang zhig gang du brda la ltos te rgyu'i dngos po yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang du brda la ltos te rgyu'i dngos po yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin te /
translated: That which is a cause in dependence on a convention is not natural,

original: dper na mig gi brda las byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mig gi brda las byung ba bzhin no //
translated: like, for example, the convention of the eye.

original: sgra'i rtogs pas rgyu'i dngos po yang brda la ltos pa @153a * //
analyzed: sgra'i rtogs pas rgyu'i dngos po yang brda la ltos pa @153a * //
translated: The cause of understanding from words is also dependent on a convention.

original: yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byad pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byad pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is a contradictory observation of a distinction.

original: 'dis kyang rtag pa nyid du dam bca' ba'i gnod pa rgyas par bshad pas 'jig par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis kyang rtag pa nyid du dam bca' ba'i gnod pa rgyas par bshad pas 'jig par byed pa yin no //
translated: This also refutes the thesis of permanence by explaining in detail the refutation.

original: brda ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: brda ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
translated: He replies, “A convention is not a cause, etc.

original: 'di 'di'i ming yin no zhes bya ba ni brda ste ;
analyzed: 'di 'di'i ming yin no zhes bya ba ni brda ste ;
translated: This is a convention, i.e., ‘This is its name.’

original: de skyes bu so so ste mi so so la byed dam skyes bu so so'i brjod pa'i 'brel pa so so la'am /
analyzed: de skyes bu so so ste mi so so la byed dam skyes bu so so'i brjod pa'i 'brel pa so so la'am /
translated: Is it the case that it is for each individual person, or is it for each individual person’s relation to expression?

original: yang na 'gro ba'i dang po'i ste 'gro ba chags pa'i dus su byed pa po dbang phyug la sogs pa la lan ci zhig ste /
analyzed: yang na 'gro ba'i dang po'i ste 'gro ba chags pa'i dus su byed pa po dbang phyug la sogs pa la lan ci zhig ste /
translated: Or, at the time of the origination of the world, what is the use of the agent, God, etc.

original: dus gcig gis byed ces bya ba rnam par rtog pa gsum mo //
analyzed: dus gcig gis byed ces bya ba rnam par rtog pa gsum mo //
translated: ? The three alternatives are: “He acts at one time,” “He acts at different times,” and “He acts without a purpose.”

original: 'brel ba'i re rer zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'brel ba'i re rer zhes bya ba la /
translated: “ In each connection” means

original: sgra dang don dag gi 'brel ba byed pa na yang res 'ga' sems can re re la tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: sgra dang don dag gi 'brel ba byed pa na yang res 'ga' sems can re re la tha dad pa'am /
translated: that when the connection between word and meaning is made, sometimes it is different for each sentient being,

original: yang na gcig kho na yin zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa gnyis so //
analyzed: yang na gcig kho na yin zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa gnyis so //
translated: or else it is just one. The two alternatives are:

original: gcig nyid kyi phyogs la rigs bzhin du yul dang dus tha dad du rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir byas par mi 'gyur te ;
analyzed: gcig nyid kyi phyogs la rigs bzhin du yul dang dus tha dad du rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir byas par mi 'gyur te ;
translated: If it is just one, then, like a universal, it would not be a product because it would not be related to different places and times.

original: rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It would be permanent, that is, it would not change.

original: ci ste sems can so so la tha dad pa de'i tshe sems can re re blo tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste sems can so so la tha dad pa de'i tshe sems can re re blo tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: But if it is different for each sentient being, then the cognition of each sentient being would be different.

original: shes pa tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni shes bya tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni shes bya tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason for the difference in cognition is the difference in the object of cognition.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra rnams lan brgyar sbyar na yan tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams kyis blo tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra rnams lan brgyar sbyar na yan tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams kyis blo tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the terms cow and so on are applied a hundred times, the minds of those who employ the terms would not be different.

original: tha mi dad par zhen pa nyid kyis tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad par zhen pa nyid kyis tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they employ the terms by conceiving them to be undifferentiated.

original: gzhan yang gal te 'brel pa sems can re re la tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar blo tha dad par 'gyur bar bya dgos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te 'brel pa sems can re re la tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar blo tha dad par 'gyur bar bya dgos te /
translated: Moreover, if the relationship were different for each sentient being, then they would undoubtedly have different minds.

original: de lta yin dang tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de lta yin dang tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: To demonstrate that this would be the case, he says:

original: smra ba po nyan pa po'i blo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: smra ba po nyan pa po'i blo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The object of the speaker’s mind and the object of the listener’s mind would be different.

original: tha dad phyir na zhes bya ba la yul gyi zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: tha dad phyir na zhes bya ba la yul gyi zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: Because they are different, the terms would not be employed as referring to a single object.

original: des na don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: smra ba po dang nyan pa po'i blo'i yul gang yin pa de tha dad pa'i phyir don gcig tu zhes pas tha snyad du byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smra ba po dang nyan pa po'i blo'i yul gang yin pa de tha dad pa'i phyir don gcig tu zhes pas tha snyad du byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the objects of the minds of the speaker and the listener are different, the terms would not be employed as referring to a single object.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: smra po'i blo la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: smra po'i blo la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The response to that is: “In the mind of the speaker.”

original: brda'i skyes bu so so la'am zhes gang smras pa 'di las sun 'byin pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: brda'i skyes bu so so la'am zhes gang smras pa 'di las sun 'byin pa brjod pa ni /
translated: As for what was said, “to each individual person who is a conventional being,” the response to that is:

original: nyan pa po la zhes bya ba rgyas par ro //
analyzed: nyan pa po la zhes bya ba rgyas par ro //
translated: “To the hearer,” and so on.

original: nyan pa la phyed min zhes bya ba ni de ni zhig zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan pa la phyed min zhes bya ba ni de ni zhig zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The hearer does not hear the sound that has ceased” because that has already ceased.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is in the process of arising,” because it has not yet arisen.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is present,” because it has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the speaker,” because the speaker has not been seen before.

original: ston byed de yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ston byed de yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: “Nor does he see the one who teaches,” because the one who teaches has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the object of expression,” because the object of expression has not been seen before.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //🔽@153b bum pa la sogs pa la zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba bstan pas sun 'byin pa ma nges pa nyid du dogs par byed pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro // @153b bum pa la sogs pa la zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba bstan pas sun 'byin pa ma nges pa nyid du dogs par byed pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs te /
translated: “Nor does he see the expression,” because the expression has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the hearer,” because the hearer has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is present,” because the sound that is present has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is in the process of arising,” because the sound that is in the process of arising has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that has ceased,” because the sound that has ceased has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is present,” because the sound that is present has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is in the process of arising,” because the sound that is in the process of arising has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that has ceased,” because the sound that has ceased has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is present,” because the sound that is present has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is in the process of arising,” because the sound that is in the process of arising has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that has ceased,” because the sound that has ceased has not been seen before.

original: 'di ltar bum pa don byed par nus pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bum pa don byed par nus pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: “Nor does he see the sound that is present,” because the sound that is present has not been seen before.🔽“Nor does he see the sound that is in the process of arising,”
